name: The mistery prototype (VRWDEV)
description:
This game is under development,may some bug,please report the bug if you find it.

in game the mystery you are led to be able to solve the mystery and find out what is going on, starting from the main players who wake up from sleep, and here you start your adventure

control:

wasd : walk around

left click : pick item

E : open door

Q : use flaslight

Feature:

1.pick up item

2.use flashlight

3.unsolve mistery

4.and more and many more, but not yet implemented now

NOTE:

if your character fall out of world,reload your game by click on Esc + ~.

WINDOWS BUILD ONLY

SYSTEM MINIMUM:

RAM:4GB

PROCESSCOR:Intel i3 4005U or Better

VGA:Nvidia Geforce 920M with 2GB Vram

Storage:600mb

DirectX supports
